name: MLTaskState
desc: The state of a machine learning task.

items.name: case running
items.desc: The state of a machine learning task that’s executing.

items.name: case suspended
items.desc: The state of a machine learning task that’s paused.

items.name: case cancelling
items.desc: The state of a machine learning task that’s in mid-termination, before it could finish successfully.

items.name: case completed
items.desc: The state of a machine learning task that has finished successfully.

items.name: case failed
items.desc: The state of a machine learning task that has terminated due to an error.
